description: Stylesheet for theme management and layout of the App component in a tic-tac-toe frontend application.

classes.name: App
classes.description: The main container class for the application, sets text alignment, background color, and basic layout.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Header class for the application, manages layout, background color, and styling of the header area.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Styling for links within the application.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Button class for toggling between light and dark themes, includes styling for hover and active states.
